name: Adam
msg_content: Hey Amelia, have you found any clues about the missing artifact?

name: Amelia
msg_content: Nothing concrete yet. The museum's security footage was corrupted.

options.option_text: Propose hiring a data recovery expert

name: Adam
msg_content: That's suspicious. Do you think it was an inside job?

name: Amelia
msg_content: Possibly. I'm checking the staff schedules for that night.

options.option_text: Offer to help with schedule review
Ask if there were any unusual shifts

name: Adam
msg_content: Good idea. I'll talk to the security guards who were on duty.

options.option_text: Ask if they've noticed anything unusual

name: Amelia
msg_content: Wait, I found something interesting. The artifact was moved three times last month.

options.option_text: Check if there were any damage reports during transfers

name: Adam
msg_content: That's unusual. Standard protocol is to minimize handling of ancient pieces.

options.option_text: Check if there were any official reports

name: Amelia
msg_content: Exactly. And guess who authorized each transfer? Dr. Lynwood.

options.option_text: Check his travel records around those times

name: Adam
msg_content: The museum director? Why would he risk his reputation?

name: Amelia
msg_content: I don't know yet, but his financial records show some recent large purchases.

options.option_text: Check if the purchases are related to the museum

name: Adam
msg_content: We should be careful about accusing him without solid evidence.

options.option_text: Set up surveillance on Dr. Lynwood

name: Amelia
msg_content: Of course. I'm just connecting dots, not drawing conclusions yet.

name: Adam
msg_content: I found something too. The alarm system was disabled for 'maintenance' that night.

options.option_text: Find out who ordered the maintenance
Check if the maintenance was legitimate

name: Amelia
msg_content: Who authorized the maintenance?

name: Adam
msg_content: That's the thing - there's no record of who approved it.

options.option_text: Check if there were any unauthorized access attempts

name: Amelia
msg_content: Wait, look at this email I just found. Dr. Lynwood received a message from an anonymous account.

options.option_text: Try to trace the anonymous account

name: Adam
msg_content: What does it say?

options.option_text: Check the email headers for more info

name: Amelia
msg_content: 'The final payment will be made after delivery. Remember our agreement.'

options.option_text: Use this as evidence to act
Look for more emails from the same sender

name: Adam
msg_content: That's it! We need to alert the authorities immediately.

name: Amelia
msg_content: Already on it. I've sent the evidence to Detective Garcia. They're on their way.
